860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a folded paper with a cardboard piece and apply glue to secure it.

episodes.name: Place metal-board
episodes.description: The person picks up a metal board and places and adjusts it onto the paper.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare a cold drink by assembling a cup, adding ice, pouring liquid, sweetening with sugar, and stirring.

episodes.name: Get bottle
episodes.description: The person opens the fridge, takes a bottle out, closes the fridge, and places the bottle on the counter.

episodes.name: Fetch & prepare spoon/cup
episodes.description: The person opens a drawer to get a spoon, places it, picks up a cup, tastes the drink, uses the tap to rinse the spoon, and stirs the drink with the spoon.

episodes.name: Add ice
episodes.description: The person opens the freezer, takes out an ice tray, places it, closes the freezer, removes ice cubes from the tray, and adds ice into the cup.

episodes.name: Pour & sweeten
episodes.description: The person grabs the bottle, opens it, pours liquid into the cup, places the bottle back, opens a jar, scoops sugar with a spoon, adds sugar into the cup, and returns the spoon.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Set up and operate a generator and use its hose to water plants.

episodes.name: Generator Setup
episodes.description: The person prepares and configures the generator and its tank/hose by pushing controls, checking the generator, handling lids and the tank, and connecting and adjusting the hose.

episodes.name: Refuel & Water Plants
episodes.description: The person connects wiring, inspects and wipes hands, handles a bottle of fuel to pour into the generator, then uses the hose to turn/towards and spray water onto plants before turning off the water.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew a piece of fabric and finish it by threading and stitching, trimming excess thread, inspecting, adjusting, and smoothing the sewn fabric.

episodes.name: Threading and Sewing
episodes.description: The person threads the needle and sews the fabric, tightening and arranging thread, then places the needle and thread on the workbench.

episodes.name: Trimming and Finishing
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors to cut and trim thread, places and holds thread, passes thread through the needle, inspects and adjusts the sewn fabric, cuts excess thread, puts tools down, and smoothens the fabric.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare dough from ingredients and shape it for baking

episodes.name: Gather & Add Flour
episodes.description: The person picks up flour from a shelf, carries and pours it into the mixer, then places the flour container on the table.

episodes.name: Add, Mix & Shape
episodes.description: The person adds remaining ingredients (sugar, water), operates the mixer, takes out and kneads the dough, prepares a pan, rolls and cuts the dough, and places tools aside.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Paint, secure, and clean a railing (apply paint, tighten a bolt, then wipe and inspect the railing).

episodes.name: Paint and Repair
episodes.description: The person paints the railing, repositions a chair, tightens a bolt with a screwdriver, and performs initial cleaning/brush steps.

episodes.name: Final Wipe & Inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the railing with it, and inspects the cleaned railing.

a0d6bd8e-c477-442b-bab3-731775b44b43.overall_goal: Clean the car: prepare supplies, wet and wash the vehicle, then finish by adjusting the wipers.

episodes.name: Prepare & Wet
episodes.description: The person gathers and readies cleaning supplies, fills a bucket from the tap, sprays water onto the car, and readies the sponge and towel.

episodes.name: Wash the Car
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, holds and washes the car using the sponge (moving and flipping the sponge as needed).

episodes.name: Finish & Lower
episodes.description: The person lowers the wiper back into place to finish the cleaning process.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Maintain the garden by removing weeds and unwanted vines, trimming and collecting debris, and watering plants.

episodes.name: Garden maintenance
episodes.description: The person sequentially pulls and places weeds, uses shears to cut vines, collects grass with a rake, waters and tends plants, and stores tools.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare, secure, insulate, and connect electrical wires to a socket.

episodes.name: Prepare & Secure Wiring
episodes.description: The person prepares wires and tools, feeds and secures wire connections to the socket, insulates them, and performs cutting and tightening steps.

episodes.name: Connect Cable
episodes.description: The person picks up the cable and socket and inserts the cable into the socket to complete the connection.

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Clean and dry the car (including washing the windshield and managing wipers), while managing and refilling cleaning supplies.

episodes.name: Setup and Rinse
episodes.description: The person prepares equipment (bucket and hose), sets items down, then rinses the car with the hose and sets the hose aside.

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Clean a car by washing, rinsing, and drying its surfaces.

episodes.name: Prepare rag
episodes.description: The person picks up and prepares the rag (including an initial wipe and dipping it into the bucket).

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare, shape, cook and clean up after making dough strips (knead and roll dough, cook strips, then tidy up).

episodes.name: Prepare & Cook
episodes.description: The person rolls and shapes dough, cooks dough strips in a pan on the stove, finishes cooking, seasons, and tidies up and stores tools.

episodes.name: Cut & Separate
episodes.description: The person cuts the dough with a cutter, places the cutter down, picks up a scraper and separates the dough-strips.

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Clean, dry, and store kitchenware (wash dishes/pots/pans/sieve/pizza-tray) and tidy the sink/counter area.

episodes.name: Wash Sieve
episodes.description: Person picks up a sponge, turns on the tap, holds a sieve and washes it, then puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Rinse and Dry Sieve/Plate
episodes.description: Person rinses the sieve, turns the tap off, picks up a towel to dry the sieve, puts items down, then picks up a sponge to wash a plate.

episodes.name: Load Sink: Trays & Plates
episodes.description: Person rinses and turns off the tap for a plate, dries and puts items down, then picks up a pizza-tray and plates from the table and carries them to and places them into the sink.

episodes.name: Bring Sieve & Wash Pan
episodes.description: Person picks up a sieve from the counter, carries it to the sink and places it in, then picks up a sponge, turns on the tap, holds and washes a pan, and puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Dry & Store Items
episodes.description: Person rinses and turns off the tap for the pan, uses a towel to dry and put items down, then picks up plates, pizza-tray, pan and sieve and places them into the cupboard, wipes the counter with a cloth, and readies a sponge and tap.

episodes.name: Wash Sink
episodes.description: Person washes the sink using a sponge.

episodes.name: Clean Pan from Stove
episodes.description: Person turns off the tap, puts the sponge down, picks up a towel to dry the sink, then picks up a pan from the stove, carries it to the sink and places it in, picks up a sponge, turns on the tap and washes the pizza-tray, and puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Final Rinse & Dry
episodes.description: Person rinses the pizza-tray under the tap, turns the tap off, picks up a towel to dry the tray, and puts the towel down.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Tune and prepare a guitar and set up the music book on a stand for reading.

episodes.name: Prepare and Read Book
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens a book, flips through pages, marks it, and reads it while holding it.

episodes.name: Tune Guitar and Set Up
episodes.description: The person picks up the guitar, releases/adjusts and tightens its strings, tests and holds the instrument, then places the book on a stand and adjusts the stand/book before reading from the stand.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Install and secure a bolt on the engine, apply adhesive and perform finishing/cleanup while preparing and moving parts.

episodes.name: Prepare brush & wrench
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush and a container, dips the brush into the container, puts the container down, and then picks up a wrench.

episodes.name: Bolt installation & finish
episodes.description: The person places and holds a bolt on the engine, tightens it with a wrench, releases and puts the wrench down, then uses a tissue to clean, reapplies to the bolt (glue with brush), and picks up a ring before moving toward the machine.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble nut-filled crackers: peel nuts, place nuts between crackers, press them together, and put assembled crackers on a plate.

episodes.name: Arrange crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers on a plate to prepare a workspace for assembly.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Set up a bench grinder (install wheel and start it) and sharpen a chisel.

episodes.name: Unlock & Prepare
episodes.description: The person picks up a key, inserts it into the grinder's lock, and holds the grinder in place.

episodes.name: Install Wheel & Start
episodes.description: The person positions the chisel on the rest, installs and aligns the grinding wheel, tightens it with a wrench, then uses the key to operate the grinder (turn/lock interactions).

episodes.name: Sharpen Chisel
episodes.description: With the grinder running, the person holds the chisel against the rotating wheel, adjusts the handle, and files the chisel using the grinder wheel.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: turn, file

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble dough-based items with sauce and bake them

episodes.name: Prepare and Roll Dough
episodes.description: The person prepares dough pieces, uses flour and a cutter, then uses a roller to flatten/roll the dough on a surface.

episodes.name: Assemble and Prepare Oven
episodes.description: The person places the tray in the oven, seasons and oils the dough, retrieves a pot and sauce, and prepares the sauce with a spoon.

episodes.name: Spread Sauce
episodes.description: The person uses a spoon to spread sauce onto the dough (repeated spreading actions).

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare and bake dough pieces: shape and cut dough pieces, place them on a tray, load the tray into the oven, and apply an egg wash.

episodes.name: Prepare and Shape Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and shapes dough pieces, places them on a tray, readies the workspace (cleaning), prepares the tray and cutting tool, then cuts and releases the dough pieces.

episodes.name: Load Oven & Prep Brush
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, picks up the tray and places it into the oven, closes and sets the timer, then picks up and dips a brush into egg.

episodes.name: Apply Egg Wash
episodes.description: The person holds the tray and uses a brush dipped in egg to apply egg wash to the dough pieces, then puts down the brush.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: hold, apply, put-down

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten a wood piece to a wooden base by positioning parts, clamping, drilling holes, and securing with screws.

episodes.name: Prepare & Drill
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and parts, positions and secures the workpieces with clamps, drills holes, and manages tools between hands.

episodes.name: Final Fastening
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and screw and positions the screw onto the wood-piece to fasten it.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a wooden piece by applying paint, sanding and cleaning, and opening the paint can.

episodes.name: Paint Application
episodes.description: The person picks up a paintbrush, repeatedly dips it into a can and paints the wood, then puts down the brush and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Sanding and Cleaning
episodes.description: The person picks up sandpaper to sand the wood, sets it down, picks up cloth and wipes the wood, then releases it.

episodes.name: Open Paint Can
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and a can (with hands) and uses the screwdriver to open the can.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble a bicycle by attaching pedals and brakes, connecting and adjusting brake cables, placing the frame on a workbench, and installing and aligning the wheels.

episodes.name: Attach Pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up a pedal, attaches it to the bicycle frame, tightens the bolt with a wrench, then releases and puts the wrench down.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Clean and service a camera: wipe/clean the camera, attach a cover with a screwdriver, and later remove the cover.

episodes.name: Wipe and Prep
episodes.description: The person picks up a wipe and the camera, cleans the inside and exterior of the camera with the wipe, and returns the wipe/camera to the table.

episodes.name: Attach Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cover and places it onto the camera, uses a screwdriver to screw the cover onto the camera, then puts the screwdriver back on the table.

episodes.name: Hold, Clean, Unscrew
episodes.description: The person holds the camera, cleans it again with a wipe, picks up a screwdriver and unscrews (removes) the cover, then puts the screwdriver down.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Set up and use a laptop workstation  power the laptop, connect peripherals (keyboard, mouse), and interact with the laptop using keyboard and mouse.

episodes.name: Use Laptop Input
episodes.description: The person interacts with the laptop by pressing keys and a button (likely typing and using a control/power button).

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Assemble and later disassemble a bicycle wheel and tire (mount wheel and tire, secure with bolts, then remove them).

episodes.name: Attach Wheel & Tire
episodes.description: The person brings the bicycle to the workbench, holds and attaches the wheel, picks up bolts and inserts them, applies glue to the tire, and puts the glue down.

episodes.name: Fit Tire and Secure
episodes.description: The person picks up a patch (piece of cloth) and attaches it to the tire, fits the tire onto the wheel using a screwdriver, picks up a wrench, holds the bolt and tightens it, then releases the bolt.

episodes.name: Remove Wheel and Tire
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench from the toolbox, loosens and removes bolts, removes the wheel from the bicycle, places the wheel on the workbench, then uses a screwdriver to loosen the tire and puts the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Detach Tire
episodes.description: The person releases the wheel, holds the tire, and removes the tire from the wheel with both hands.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Prepare and securely close a container lid by cleaning, aligning and sealing it with tape

episodes.name: Prepare & Close Lid
episodes.description: The person picks up the lid and container, cleans the container surface, places and aligns the lid, presses it into place, releases the lid, picks up tape and scissors, and cuts a piece of tape.

episodes.name: Tape & Inspect
episodes.description: The person places the tape and scissors, applies tape around the lid edge, smooths the tape, and checks the taped attachment.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare a dough mixture, place portions on a tray, and bake them in the oven.

episodes.name: Prepare & Bake Prep
episodes.description: The person readies the oven, prepares ingredients (measure, pour, and mix them), places dough portions on a tray, and readies the tray for baking.

episodes.name: Release Bowl
episodes.description: The person releases the held bowl from their second hand.

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Attach a pipe assembly to a motorcycle wheel and secure it by inserting and tightening bolts and nuts, using hand tools.

episodes.name: Attach Pipe Assembly
episodes.description: The person folds tags, prepares the wheel, picks up tools, positions a pipe, inserts bolts and nuts, tightens fasteners with tools, and puts tools down to complete the assembly.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare onions for cooking and start the cooking process (wash, prep, and begin heating).

episodes.name: Prepare and Cook Onion
episodes.description: The person washes an onion, prepares a pot of water, returns the onion to the board, slices and peels the onion, places the pot on the cooker and turns on the heat.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare, fasten, and position a wooden piece by cutting, measuring, drilling, inserting and tightening a screw, then placing and finalizing the piece on the workbench.

episodes.name: Prepare and Fasten
episodes.description: The person prepares the wood (cutting, measuring, marking), drills and inserts a screw, and tightens it using various tools.

episodes.name: Place and Finish
episodes.description: The person releases and repositions the wooden piece, places it on the workbench, holds it, removes tape, and puts the tape down.

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare and process dough by measuring and mixing flour and water, then loading and operating a machine, with additional flour adjustments.

episodes.name: Prepare Flour & Mix
episodes.description: The person retrieves and opens the flour bag, prepares the bowl, mixes flour and water, and kneads the resulting dough.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Pot and top up soil around a planted seedling using a trowel and a bag of soil

episodes.name: Planting and initial filling
episodes.description: The person places and adjusts the plant in the planter, then picks up the trowel and repeatedly scoops soil from the bag and pours it into the planter, finally putting the trowel down.

episodes.name: Continued topping up
episodes.description: After releasing the bag, the person continues dipping the trowel into the soil bag, scooping soil and pouring it into the planter in repeated cycles, then releases the planter.

episodes.name: Final adjustments
episodes.description: The person puts the trowel down, picks it up again, holds the bag, performs another dip-scoop-remove cycle to add soil, releases the bag, and then holds the planter.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Install, adjust, and verify a gauge on a wheel/motorcycle assembly

episodes.name: Prepare tools & parts
episodes.description: The person retrieves a pack and tools, opens packaging, picks up a screwdriver and screws, tightens screws on the gauge, cleans and inspects the gauge, and collects additional small parts from storage.

episodes.name: Insert & adjust screw
episodes.description: The person holds the gauge, inserts a screw into it, examines and adjusts the screw with pliers, then puts the pliers down.

episodes.name: Release gauge
episodes.description: The person releases the gauge from the assisting hand.

episodes.name: Grab wrench
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench from the table to prepare for tightening/installation tasks.

episodes.name: Mount & adjust on wheel
episodes.description: The person holds the wheel, fixes the gauge onto the wheel using the wrench, tightens and taps the gauge with a hammer as needed, cleans and inspects the wheel and gauge, and then repositions and moves the motorcycle while making final adjustments.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Detach and remove a wire from a plug by loosening nuts and pulling the wire out, using a screwdriver and hands.

episodes.name: Prepare & Loosen
episodes.description: The person picks up the plug and screwdriver and loosens a nut on the plug.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Prepare and service a wheel assembly by gathering tools, removing the wheel, and tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Gather and store tools
episodes.description: The person picks up various tools (wrench, plier, spanner), places them and ultimately stores them in a box and covers it.

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Dismantle a section of fence, collect and store the removed fasteners and tools, then undo a rope knot.

episodes.name: Remove fence board
episodes.description: The person lifts a fence board, carries it, and places it on the ground.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Inspect a plant, untie and remove a rope attached to it, collect and store the rope, and clean up afterwards.

episodes.name: Inspect and Prepare
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant, clears debris, brings and positions the plant while examining and gripping the rope in preparation for untying.

episodes.name: Place Plant Down
episodes.description: The person places the plant down (sets it down) with a hand to steady or reposition it.

episodes.name: Untie and Remove Rope
episodes.description: The person unties, pulls, loosens, untangles and inspects the rope attached to the plant, removes it, collects and places the rope into storage, and then wipes their hands.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Paint a door while preparing and organizing the paint and workspace.

episodes.name: Initial Brush Dip
episodes.description: The person dips the paintbrush into the paint can to load paint onto the brush.

episodes.name: Hold and Paint
episodes.description: The person holds the door-frame and paints it, intermittently dipping the brush back into the paint.

episodes.name: Workspace Setup
episodes.description: The person releases the door, spreads protective plastic, moves and opens the paint can (removing/placing the lid), dips the brush, arranges tools on the plastic, secures the lid, and places the paint can on the plastic wrap.

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Clean and dry kitchenware (wash, rinse, and dry bowl and mug, then return items to sink/table)

episodes.name: Wash and Dry Dishes
episodes.description: The person brings a mug and bowl to the sink, opens the tap, washes and rinses them, closes the tap, dries them with a towel, and returns the towel and cleaned items to the table/sink.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a wooden surface by brushing off debris, sanding, applying oil, and wiping it clean.

episodes.name: Pick up brush
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush with their first hand to begin working.

episodes.name: Brush debris off
episodes.description: The person holds the wood and uses the brush (with hand1 and hand2 involvement) to brush debris off the wood and interact with a leaf, then puts the brush down.

episodes.name: Release leaf
episodes.description: The person releases the leaf using their second hand.

episodes.name: Finish: oil, sand, wipe
episodes.description: The person picks up oil to apply it to the wood, sands the wood with sandpaper, and finally wipes the wood with a cloth before putting tools down.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Examine and manipulate a card on a table (inspect, pick up, check, and put back).

episodes.name: Initial probing
episodes.description: The person repeatedly touches and taps the card on the table to probe or indicate it without picking it up.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Refill the car's windshield-washer reservoir by fetching water with a bucket and pouring it into the tank.

episodes.name: Refill Washer Tank
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up and places a bucket, walks to a tap to fill it with water, carries the bucket to the car, pours water into the car's washer tank (with intermittent checks), and places the bucket down.

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare, season, and bake shaped dough pieces (shape dough, apply egg wash, season, place on tray, and bake in the oven).

episodes.name: Form Dough Pieces
episodes.description: The person picks up and manipulates dough  dipping, twisting, shaping, rolling and placing pieces onto the work surface and tray.

episodes.name: Apply Egg Wash
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, applies egg wash to the dough pieces with the brush, then puts the brush down on the table.

episodes.name: Season and Bake
episodes.description: The person seasons the dough with salt, loads the tray and carries it to the oven, places it inside, closes the oven door, and sets the timer.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Remove baked bread from the oven into a basket, then clean up and return/arrange the tray and tools.

episodes.name: Retrieve & Transfer Bread
episodes.description: The person takes the tray from the oven, opens the oven, uses a paddle to scoop bread out and transfers the bread into a basket, then places tools on the table.

episodes.name: Clean & Return
episodes.description: The person brushes off crumbs, places the brush, picks up and returns the tray to the oven and closes it, then picks up a spatula, arranges the bread in the basket, and sets the spatula down.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Prepare and load a tray with cups and plates by arranging tableware on the dining table and transferring items onto the tray.

episodes.name: Set Table
episodes.description: The person arranges cups, plates and a dish on the dining table and adjusts their positions.

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: Prepare dough (mixing flour and water), shape it into a pan, and bake it in the oven.

episodes.name: Prepare & Cut Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds and cuts the dough, then puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Mixing & Baking Prep
episodes.description: The person releases and works the dough (rolling/stretching), adds flour and water, mixes them, places the dough into a pan and puts the pan into the oven, then sets the timer.

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Prepare, press (iron), and fold a piece of fabric using hands and an iron.

episodes.name: Prepare & Initial Ironing
episodes.description: The person adjusts and arranges the fabric on the ironing board, picks up the iron, performs initial ironing motions, and puts the iron down.

episodes.name: Final Ironing & Folding
episodes.description: The person continues manipulating the fabricreleasing and repositioning it, performing further ironing passes, checking (feeling), folding, and finally moving the folded fabric to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare, iron, and fold garments (shirt/short) using an iron, then place folded items on a board and store the iron.

episodes.name: Prepare & Fold Garments
episodes.description: The person picks up garments, lays and spreads them on a board, adjusts and folds them, and places a folded item and the iron into storage/onto a board.

episodes.name: Ironing Sequence
episodes.description: The person retrieves the iron and garments, arranges the garment on the board, and repeatedly picks up the iron to press, move across, lift, and place it while adjusting the garment.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Collect leaves by cutting them with pruning shears and depositing them into a basket

episodes.name: Leaf harvesting session
episodes.description: The person picks up and positions a basket, repeatedly holds leaves, cuts them with pruning shears, and places the cut leaves into the basket, interspersed with carrying and setting down the basket.

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on vehicles (motorcycle and scooter): change a tyre, check and tighten fasteners, inspect and remove/clean/unscrew parts.

episodes.name: Tyre removal & fit
episodes.description: The person removes a tyre from the motorcycle, places it down, then picks it up again and fits it onto the motorcycle.

episodes.name: Check and tighten fasteners
episodes.description: The person checks the scooter for screws, picks up tools (spanner, wrench) and tightens screws/bolts on the scooter and motorcycle, then returns the tools to the workbench.

episodes.name: Inspect, clean & unscrew
episodes.description: The person inspects the motorcycle for loose parts, wipes off grease with a cloth, and then uses tools (wrench, spanner, screwdriver) to unscrew, loosen and remove bolts and screws, placing removed parts and tools on the workbench.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: inspect, pick-up, wipe-off, place, unscrew, put-down, loosen, remove

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare dough, shape and place dough pieces into a pan, and brush them with oil.

episodes.name: Prepare, shape, assemble
episodes.description: The person prepares the dough (mixing and kneading), rolls and cuts it into pieces, places the pieces into a pan, and finishes by brushing oil onto them.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Load the washing machine and add detergent to start laundry.

episodes.name: Transport Basket
episodes.description: The person picks up the laundry basket, carries it to the washing machine area, and puts it down next to the machine.

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Prepare materials and clean the workspace by gathering supplies, scraping debris from wood, then sweeping and collecting dust.

episodes.name: Gather & Scrape
episodes.description: The person collects and places various supplies (bucket, tape, paper, carpet, glove, scraper), puts on gloves, holds the wood and scrapes it, then releases the wood.

episodes.name: Clean & Collect
episodes.description: The person retrieves cleaning tools (rod, ladder, scraper, broom, dustpan), scrubs the floor with the scraper, sweeps with the broom, and collects dust into the dustpan.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, place, hold, scrub, put-down, sweep, collect

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric to a door and fasten the associated bolts and nuts using hand tools.

episodes.name: Attach fabric & align
episodes.description: The person picks up fabric, attaches it to the door, and aligns/adjusts a bolt using a screwdriver before setting the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Fasten nuts & tidy
episodes.description: The person releases the bolt, gathers wrenches/spanner and nuts, loosens a net, places spare parts, inserts nuts and tightens them with tools, then puts tools back.

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Care for a potted plant: clean the pot, groom and position the plant, add fertilizer, water it, and trim its leaves.

episodes.name: Clean Pot
episodes.description: The person cleans the pot using a cloth and then puts the cloth down and releases the pot.
